title: Withdrawing vs dropping a subject
content:
In pesuacademy there r 2 options to either withdraw or drop the subject. 

Whats the diff???

comments.body:
Withdraw means to unregister yourself for the ESA of that course so you can give the ESA the next time the course ESA is offered. 

Dropping a course is basically unenrolling from the course completely. Depending on the type of course, it might become a backlog or might not cause any damage.
So I give that ESA in 2nd sem or with 1st sem students of next year? And isa marks will be void then?
Yes, your ISA marks will be void.
